assignments.description: Assign Start Date Time to a text variable
assignments.name: Assign_Start_Date_Time
assignments.label: Assign Start Date Time

assignments.name: Set_Var_for_Overlap_Error
assignments.label: Set Var for Overlap Error to True

Flow.description: A Subflow for Modify appointment that will let the MSA keep the same provider while modifying the appointment 1.18.0 - Feature CCCM-38380 - Generate VVS Link for Video Appointment; pass in VVS feature flag variable 1.16.0 Adding overlapping checks and error message

formulas.description: The naming convention for the Event's Subject field.
formulas.name: eventTitle

formulas.description: When VVS feature flag is true and user checks Generate Video Link checkbox on screen, it will be the URL returned from the callout When VVS feature flag is false or user does not check video link checkbox, it will be the field value from user input. Generate Video Link checkbox is only displayed when feature flag is True.
formulas.name: formula_VVS_Field_Value

formulas.description: Format start time in UTC for the VVS link callout
formulas.name: formulaStartTimeUTC

formulas.description: Get's the time one hours before the selected start time for the service appointment
formulas.name: oneHourBeforeStartTime

Flow.interviewLabel: VCC Modify Appointment Same Provider Subflow {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: VCC Modify Appointment Same Provider Subflow

recordLookups.description: Query the Event related to the Appointment
recordLookups.name: getRelatedEvent
recordLookups.label: getRelatedEvent

recordUpdates.description: Update the related event with the correct naming convention.
recordUpdates.name: updateRelatedEvent
recordUpdates.label: updateRelatedEvent

validationRule.errorMessage: You must verify the patient's phone and email for this VCV appointment﻿

fields.name: scheduledStartTime
fields.fieldText: Scheduled Start: {!ServiceAppointment.SchedStartTime}

fields.name: scheduledEndTime
fields.fieldText: Scheduled End: {!ServiceAppointment.SchedEndTime}

fields.name: OverlapErrorText
fields.fieldText: ERROR: VCV Appointment cannot be scheduled for patient within an hour of a previously scheduled VCV appointment. Please select another time.

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: The Start Date Time of the related Event.
variables.name: eventStartDateTime

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName

variables.description: Value of VCC_SCD_Automation_Configuration__mdt.Generate_VVS_Link__c feature flag, passed in from VCC_Modify_Appointment parent flow
variables.name: var_FeatureFlagMdtVVS
